caption: A laid-back reggae track with offbeat guitar skanks, deep dub bass, and smooth male vocals. The production features classic one-drop drumming, melodica accents, and warm analog delay effects that create a sunny island vibe.
lyrics:
[Intro]

[Verse 1]
Sun is rising over the bay
Another beautiful Caribbean day
No worries on my mind today
Just let the music play

[Chorus]
One love, one heart
We're never gonna be apart
One love, one soul
Together we are whole
Yeah mon

[Verse 2]
Feel the breeze upon my face
This island is my sacred place
Roots and culture in my veins
Washing away all the pains

[Chorus]
One love, one heart
We're never gonna be apart
One love, one soul
Together we are whole

[Bridge]

Positive vibration
Across every nation
Spread love not hate
Before it's too late

[Verse 3]
From the mountains to the sea
This is where I'm meant to be
Living life so naturally
Roots and reggae setting me free

[Outro Chorus]
One love, one heart
One love, one soul
Yeah mon, irie
